I second red2silver. I wonder if Zen_Bud can ask anoXmous to re-encode this movie because I want to collect 2008's TDK and 2012's TDKR that show the IMAX scenes in its proper format. I tried to check the version encoded by YIFY but only the 2012's TDKR comes with the IMAX scenes intact. YIFY's TDK is cropped so I can't get enjoy the IMAX scenes.

@Atamenes
ur mistaken Yify's both 720p and 1080p releases have IMAX scenes, no cropping, bcoz if he cropped it the resolution would be like this 1280x544 / 1920x800

@shaaani

I noticed that only YIFY's Dark Knight Rises (720p and 1080p) have the IMAX scenes.

YIFY's Dark Knight (only available in 1080p) has the IMAX scenes cropped.

That's why I wish that Zen_Bud could request  anoXmous to re-encode the video to fix the problem.

Thanks!

@ Atamenes - Can you explain what you mean, when you say cropped? I think YIFY's copies are always in IMAX form?
around 2:06 few seconds missed, that's why after that subtitle's going out of sync

@MoviesR101

Here is what I noticed:

The Dark Knight (2008) rip by YIFY (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6923245/The_Dark_Knight_(2008)_1080p_BluRay_x264_-_1.7GB_-_YIFY) lists the video resolution at 1920x800.

Meanwhile, The Dark Knight Rises (2012) rip by YIFY (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7830983/The_Dark_Knight_Rises_(2012)_1080p_BrRip_x264_-_YIFY) lists the video resolution at 1920x1080.

The difference of 280 pixels is the reason why I realize that YIFY's encode for The Dark Knight cropped the IMAX scenes.

I hope this clarifies the difference between YIFY's encode for TDK and TDKR.

always download & appreciate Zen_Bud and anoXmous' work. however for this series I've gone with MXMG encodes: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6578075/Batman_Begins_2005_BRRip_1080p_H264_DXVA_AAC-MXMG
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6588508/The_Dark_Knight_2008_BRRip_1080p_H264_DXVA_AAC-MXMG

unless they've got hold of promo/press copies.
